Description: Fragment of North Ionian pottery lotus bowl. Exterior: top of rim glazed; glaze dot and pendant lotus flower preserved in lip zone; line and two bands below; line and band on lower wall.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. VII, no. 12)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1062)
